A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did enjoy some of the key images and the cinematography generally. Perhaps if I watch it again it will be with the sound down and music playing.\nBut as for the rest\, it deserves every criticism levelled at it. And I like others call BS on the critics 90% rating.\nSo yeah they did a pretty shitty job of it\, when they had a some great elements to do so well.
